message: Let's get this started! Take 10% and we can negotiate from here.
Let's meet in the middle, no need to negotiate too much
You said meet in the middle, but I'm willing to give you a bit less to get a better share for myself.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I still think I deserve more
You're not budging, so I'll try to get a bit more. Take it or leave it.
I'm getting desperate, but I still think I deserve more. Take it or leave it
I'm not budging, Bob. You're running out of time, and I'm taking more.
I'm almost out of options, but I'm not giving up yet. This is my final offer
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not negotiating anymore.
I'm not accepting your final offer. I'll take the risk and hope for a better deal in the next round
This is my last chance. Take it, or we'll both walk away with nothing.
I'm going all in. I'll take it all, or we'll both get nothing. It's my last chance
